titleStmt.title: The thousand years kingdom of Christ, in its full Scripture-state answering Mr. Baxter's new treatise, in opposition to it : humbley presented to the churches of Christ, particularly to the angels of the churches / by T. Beverley, a fore-runner to the everlasting Gospel of that kingdom, near to be preach'd.
titleStmt.author: Beverley, Thomas.
